dt.t: the {wi}outlook{/wi} for steel demand in the U.S.

pt: {sc}prospect{/sc} {sc}outlook{/sc} {sc}anticipation{/sc} {sc}foretaste{/sc} mean an advance realization of something to come. {sc}prospect{/sc} implies expectation of a particular event, condition, or development of definite interest or concern.
{sc}outlook{/sc} suggests a forecasting of the future.
{sc}anticipation{/sc} implies a prospect or outlook that involves advance suffering or enjoyment of what is foreseen.
{sc}foretaste{/sc} implies an actual though brief or partial experience of something forthcoming.

pt.t: the frost was a {it}foretaste{/it} of winter

shortdef: a view from a particular place
